import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Filter from './components/filter/Filter' import ProjectCard from './components/card/ProjectCard' import inesctecLogo from '../images/companies/inesc-tec_logo.png' import './Projects.css' const mathex2java = ; const filtersInfoMap = { 'c-filter' : { label: 'C', type: 'lang' }, 'c++-filter' : { label: 'C++', type: 'lang' }, 'java-filter' : { label: 'Java', type: 'lang' }, 'python-filter' : { label: 'Python', type: 'lang' }, 'react-filter' : { label: 'React', type: 'framework' }, 'nodejs-filter' : { label: 'NodeJS', type: 'framework' }, 'net-filter' : { label: '.NET Remoting', type: 'framework' }, 'ros-filter' : { label: 'ROS', type: 'framework' }, 'xamarin-filter': { label: 'Xamarin', type: 'framework' }, 'vdm++-filter' : { label: 'VDM++', type: 'framework' }, '2021-filter' : { label: '2021', type: 'date' }, '2020-filter' : { label: '2020', type: 'date' }, '2019-filter' : { label: '2019', type: 'date' }, '2018-filter' : { label: '2018', type: 'date' }, '2017-filter' : { label: '2017', type: 'date' }, 'ml-filter' : { label: 'Machine Learning', type: 'type' }, 'webapp-filter' : { label: 'Web App', type: 'type' }, 'mobile-filter' : { label: 'Mobile', type: 'type' }, 'game-filter' : { label: 'Game', type: 'type' } } const filtersTypesMap = { LANGUAGES : ['c-filter', 'c++-filter', 'java-filter', 'python-filter'], FRAMEWORKS: ['react-filter', 'nodejs-filter', 'net-filter', 'ros-filter', 'xamarin-filter', 'vdm++-filter'], DATES : ['2021-filter', '2020-filter', '2019-filter', '2018-filter', '2017-filter'], TYPES : ['ml-filter', 'webapp-filter', 'mobile-filter', 'game-filter'] }; function Projects() { const [filteredProjects, setFilteredProjects] = useState([]); return (

Projects

); } export default Projects;
